import React from 'react' import AccordianContent from './AccordianContent' const Accordian = ({ data , showItems ,setind}) => { // console.log(data); return <>
setind()} >

{data.title} ({data.itemCards.length})

{showItems ? "⬆️" : "⬇️"}

{showItems && }
} export default Accordian
